description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows Performance Data Helper Library (CVE-2024-38025), apply the relevant updates for your operating system version. Follow these steps:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (32-bit or 64-bit).
2. Download the appropriate KB update from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Install the update and restart your system to apply changes.

**Details**:
- KB articles for your reference:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
  - For additional versions, refer to the provided download links.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is backed up before updating.
- Confirm administrative rights to perform installations.
